TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataBoundControlAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter

summary.span: 針對特定瀏覽器要求，自訂與控制項配置器關聯的 物件之行為。

span.span: Customizes the behavior of a object with which the adapter is associated for specific browser requests.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控制項衍生自類別繫結至資料來源，並列舉它繫結的資料來源中的項目，以產生其使用者介面或子控制項階層架構。A control derived from the class is bound to a data source and generates its user interface or child control hierarchy by enumerating the items in the data source to which it is bound. 是抽象基底類別定義可以繫結至資料來源，這類的所有控制項的一般特性和控制項。 is an abstract base class that defines the common characteristics of all controls that can be bound to a data source, such as the and controls. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . A修改行為為特定的瀏覽器或瀏覽器，或採取動作的類別做為篩選條件，某些功能。A modifies the behavior of a for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability. 大部分的轉譯行為中的靈活度可以封裝在特製化類別衍生自類別。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the class. 因此，很可能單一配接器可以用於多個瀏覽器類別行為或中的靈活度，包含類別可以讓控制項配接器使用非必要。Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the classes can make the use of a control adapter unnecessary. 每個控制項透過.browser 定義檔中、 具有明確對應至介面卡有``這些檔案中的項目。Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files, if there are `` entries in these files. 因此，任何存取權的屬性使用.browser 定義檔，來執行查閱對應的控制項配接器從擷取的物件。Thus, any access to the property of the uses the object extracted from the .browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control. 在處理期間，.NET Framework 會攔截可能是特定的瀏覽器控制項的方法呼叫。During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the methods of a control that could be browser specific. 如果附加控制項配接器，.NET Framework 會呼叫相關聯的配接器的方法。If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding(System.Collections.IEnumerable) 方法繫結至相關聯的可列舉集合。The M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding(System.Collections.IEnumerable) method binds an enumerable collection to the associated . 屬性會傳回強型別的參考。The property returns a strongly typed reference to the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，並使用兩個衍生的控制項：The following code examples create and use two derived controls: - `MyDataBound`類別，衍生自，是簡單的唯讀方格控制項。The `MyDataBound` class, derived from , is a simple read-only grid control. - `MyDataBoundAdapter`類別，衍生自，轉譯成一維清單的方格資料，使用適用於小型螢幕瀏覽器的資料列分隔符號。The `MyDataBoundAdapter` class, derived from , renders the grid data as a one-dimensional list with row separators, suitable for small screen browsers. 第一個程式碼範例會使用網頁來宣告`MyDataBound`控制項和執行個體提供資料的形式物件。The first code example uses a Web page to declare a `MyDataBound` control and an instance of that provides data in the form of a object. 第二個程式碼範例包含的衍生`MyDataBound`和`MyDataBoundAdapter`類別：The second code example contains the derived `MyDataBound` and `MyDataBoundAdapter` classes: - `MyDataBound`類別會覆寫方法來儲存收集的資料來源，並覆寫方法來轉譯為 HTML 的資料來源``。The `MyDataBound` class overrides the method to save an collection for the data source, and overrides the method to render the data source as an HTML `
`. - `MyDataBoundAdapter`類別會覆寫以儲存資料來源到一維並加入資料列分隔符號。The `MyDataBoundAdapter` class overrides to save the data source to a one-dimensional and add row separators.它會覆寫呈現做為分隔的欄位清單`
`標記。It overrides to render the as a list of fields separated by `
` tags. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/CS/mydatabound.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/VB/mydatabound.vb#1)] 第三個程式碼範例會使用組態檔來不指定任何控制項配接器搭配`MyDataBound`Microsoft Internet Explorer 的瀏覽器控制項，並且`MyDataBoundAdapter`搭配使用`MyDataBound`針對特定為 Openwave 向上瀏覽器的控制項。The third code example uses a configuration file to specify that no control adapter is to be used with `MyDataBound` controls for Microsoft Internet Explorer browsers, and that a `MyDataBoundAdapter` is used with `MyDataBound` controls for Openwave UP browsers.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立對應物件。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the corresponding object.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Control As DataBoundControl

summary.span: 擷取與這個控制項配置器關聯的 物件的強型別參考。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly-typed reference to the object associated with this control adapter.
The to which this is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當物件附加至控制項，.NET Framework 會呼叫特定配接器成員，而不是控制項成員。When a object is attached to a control, the .NET Framework calls certain adapter members instead of the control members. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫配接器中的屬性衍生自類別。The following code example shows how to override the property in an adapter derived from the class. 它會傳回強型別的參考`MyDataBound`控制項。It returns a strongly typed reference to the `MyDataBound` control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/CS/mydatabound.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/VB/mydatabound.vb#2)]

para.span: 當您繼承自類別，您應該至少實作屬性來傳回範例 > 一節中所示的控制項，強型別執行個體

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you should, at a minimum, implement a property to return a strongly typed instance of the control, as shown in the Example section

summary.span: 將關聯 物件資料來源中的資料繫結至控制項配置器。

span.span: Binds the data in the data source of the associated object to the control adapter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法呼叫取代方法時至衍生自控制項附加控制項配接器類別。The method is called in place of the method when a control adapter is attached to a control derived from the class. 一般而言的覆寫逐一查看資料，建立不同的名稱和值，如有必要，並將它儲存至內部集合。Typically, an override of iterates through data, creating distinct names and values when necessary, and saves it to an internal collection. 通常或類似的方法會填入從這個內部集合中的使用者介面或子控制項。Usually, or a similar method of the will populate the user interface or child controls from that internal collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫集合，以儲存資料來源到一維物件，並將資料列分隔符號。The following code example shows how to override the collection to save the data source to a one-dimensional object and add row separators. 它也會示範如何覆寫方法以呈現做為分隔的欄位清單`
`標記。It also shows how to override the method to render the as a list of fields separated by `
` tags. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/CS/mydatabound.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/VB/mydatabound.vb#3)]

para.span: 覆寫特製化繫結邏輯時的方法時，需要目標瀏覽器-比方說，項目名稱必須建構以不同的方式比控制項的一般使用方式。

span.span: Override the method when specialized binding logic is required for the target browser - for example, when item names must be constructed differently than for the general usage of the control.

para.span: 您應該呼叫基底方法，只有當您需要的資料繫結功能。

span.span: You should call the base method only if you require the data binding functionality of the .
